#### Task 1: Loading libraries and functions, as well as creating initial set of 50 patients

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table) ## For the fread function
library(lubridate)

source("sepsis_monitor_functions.R")

df <- initializePatients()
```

#### Task 2: Upload to Google Drive 

```{r}

# Uploading happens here
drive_put(media = "sepsis_report_temp.csv",  
          path = "https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1JfYn_0kCM1IWGGSwv0VEkZ1MD2pJp9yt",
          name = "sepsis_report.csv")
```
